Schenectady.George Westinghouse Jones House: George Westinghouse Jones House, also known by the Welsh name of Caermarthen, is a historic home located in the Town of Niskayuna in Schenectady County, New York. It was built about 1900 and designed by the architectural firm of Rutan and Russell. It is a rambling, ​2 1⁄2-story gable-roofed frame residence in the Shingle Style.
